summary: Redesigned About page hero section to match the professional, modern aesthetic of the Collaboration page. Enhanced typography with refined spacing and hierarchy (text-4xl sm:text-5xl lg:text-[3.5rem]), improved button designs with ArrowRight icons and hover animations (translate-x-1, shadow effects), better image presentation with gradient overlays, shadow-2xl, and decorative accent elements, and improved visual balance with proper grid layout (lg:grid-cols-[1.15fr_0.85fr]). Added ArrowRight import. Restored App.tsx from git. Build successful.
current_status: About page hero redesigned with professional, modern styling matching Collaboration page. Build successful. Ready for review.
